StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetTasksByOrgId]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TaskDate date.me, @Organiza.onId int AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT T.ID, T.Organiza.onID, TS.ID TaskStatusID, TS.Descrip.on TaskStatus, TP.ID TaskPriorityID, TP.Descrip.on TaskPriority, T.Descrip.on, T.TaskDate, T.OriginatorRecruiterID, T.SubordinateRecruiterID, T.LastUpdateDate, T.LastUpdateUserId FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[Task] T JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[TaskStatus] AS TS ON T.TaskStatusID = TS.ID JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[TaskPriority] AS TP ON T.TaskPriorityID = TP.ID WHERE T.Organiza.onId = @Organiza.onId and ((DATEDIFF(dd,T.TaskDate,@TaskDate) >= 0 and TS.Descrip.on not in ('Complete', 'Cancelled')) or (DATEDIFF(dd,T.TaskDate,@TaskDate) = 0)) order by TaskDate desc
END
